dict.acceptation: 泥，泥淖；没价值的东西，污物；<美俚>咖啡；诽谤的话；

sent.orig: PF-PLUS water-based cation polymer mud is a kind of mud of oil in water emulsification.
sent.trans: Plus水基阳离子聚合物泥浆是属于水包油乳化型泥浆。

sent.orig: Use the mud balance to determinate the mud weight.
sent.trans: 用泥浆比重计测出泥浆的密度。

sent.orig: Use active mud and add XCD polymer to 100+ viscosity. Incorporate sweeps into the mud system.
sent.trans: 使用在用钻井液加生物聚合物把粘度提高到100秒以上，作为清扫液汇入循环系统。

sent.orig: PNL style Vertical Mud pump can offer the mine to transport mud liquid.
sent.trans: PNL型泵为卧式单级悬臂式泥浆泵，可供矿山输送矿砂混合液体之用。

sent.orig: Road at the school, rain splash, all are mud, rain and mud mixture.
sent.trans: 走在校道上，雨水飞溅，浑身都是泥巴，雨和泥的混合物。
